pr_title: Add preauth filtering overload of getAllItems(), getItems() and allItems()

timeline.message:
Add preauth filtering overload of getAllItems()

Signed-off-by: Raihaan Shouhell <raihaan.shouhell@autodesk.com>

timeline.author: varyvol
varyvol

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Gets just the immediate children of {@link Jenkins} based on supplied predicate.
          
          
            
                 * Gets just the immediate child of {@link Jenkins} based on supplied predicate.
timeline.author: varyvol

replies.bodyText: Since its a list of items it should be children instead of child
replies.author: res0nance

timeline.bodyText: Not important at all, but maybe using stream + predicate?
timeline.author: varyvol

timeline.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Evaristo Gutiérrez <egutierrez@cloudbees.com>

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to create a default Stream<T> getItemsStream() method so that ItemGroup implementations can supply more efficient stream implementations which would not require creating a full list first. Will be important if we ever do job lazy loading and so on
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,6 +58,17 @@
      */
     Collection<T> getItems();
 
+    /**
+     * Gets all the items in this collection in a read-only view
+     * that matches supplied Predicate
+     * @since TODO
+     */
+     default Collection<T> getItems(Predicate<T> pred) {
+         return getItems().stream()

replies.bodyText:
It probably would be 2 functions
default Stream<T> getItemsStream()
and
default Stream<T> getItemsStream(Predicate<T> pred)
So it still does preauth filtering since once ItemGroup is responsible for security checks. Unless we want to offload that to the caller
replies.author: res0nance

timeline.message:
Add stream functions

Signed-off-by: Raihaan Shouhell <raihaan.shouhell@autodesk.com>
